title: The Hole Inside: An Under the Tormal Shadow Short Story
description: Zachary had spent his entire life with a hole inside him where his God's love should be. He did his best to hide it from the people around him but it wasn't easy, especially from his friends. Caleb, Zachary's occasional lover, pushed the boundaries that Zachary had established to protect himself with every loving touch. One night of sex tempted Zachary to take a chance on the love Caleb offered.
author: Meyari McFarland
